headline: Crown Castle (CCI): Assessing Valuation After Q3 Beat, Raised Outlook, and Strategic Fiber Divestiture
summary: Crown Castle kicked off the week with an upbeat third-quarter earnings report, not only surpassing forecasts but also boosting its 2025 guidance. Leadership reiterated plans to sell the fiber business, which will sharpen the company’s focus on U.S. towers. See our latest analysis for Crown Castle. The upbeat Q3 earnings and higher 2025 outlook gave Crown Castle a brief lift, but shares have come under pressure lately as investors weigh growth against industry headwinds and rental revenue...
